title: Foundation Security Training
description: Essential security awareness and practices for all ClearTriage team members and partners. Covers FedRAMP fundamentals, authentication requirements, data protection, and security best practices.
objectives: Understand FedRAMP requirements and their importance to ClearTriage's survival
Master authentication procedures for AWS (YubiKey) and Google Drive (MFA)
Recognize and respond to social engineering attempts targeting our team
Classify and handle different types of data according to FedRAMP requirements
Apply essential security practices for remote work and daily operations
